lessons.japanese: 巨大な連邦財政赤字がアメリカ経済を長年に渡って苦しめている。
lessons.indonesian: A huge federal budget deficit has been plaguing the American economy for many years.

lessons.japanese: ここ数年南ア連邦は人種問題をかかえてきた。
lessons.indonesian: The Union of South Africa has had racial problems in recent years.

lessons.japanese: アメリカ人は連邦税と州税の両方を払っている。
lessons.indonesian: Americans pay both federal taxes and state taxes.

lessons.japanese: ＵＳＳＲはソビエト社会主義共和国連邦を表しています。
lessons.indonesian: U.S.S.R. stands for the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

lessons.japanese: 連邦予算はかろうじて議会の承認を得た。
lessons.indonesian: The federal budget was narrowly approved by Congress.

lessons.japanese: 連邦政府の予算削減は社会保障の給付に影響が及ぶでしょう。
lessons.indonesian: Federal budget cuts will take a bite out of Social Security benefits.

lessons.japanese: 連邦準備制度は公定歩合を１８年間で最低の水準に引き下げた。
lessons.indonesian: The Federal Reserve cut its benchmark discount rate to an 18-year low.

lessons.japanese: 連邦取引委員会は不正取引の調査で新たな確証を握りました。
lessons.indonesian: The FTC nailed down new evidence in the fraud investigation.

lessons.japanese: 米国連邦準備銀行は金利を引き下げました。
lessons.indonesian: The Federal Reserve slashed interest rates.

lessons.japanese: 彼は１９５０年代にソビエト連邦へ逃亡した。
lessons.indonesian: He defected to the Soviet Union in the 1950's.

lessons.japanese: 私はソビエト連邦のことはまったく知らない。
lessons.indonesian: I don't know about the USSR at all.

lessons.japanese: 巨大な連邦財政赤字がアメリカ経済を長年に渡って苦しめている。
lessons.indonesian: A huge federal budget deficit has been plaguing the American economy for many years.
